topic.title: Nodes running the index service
topic.shortdesc: A node running the index service must be sized properly to create and maintain secondary indexes and to perform index scan for N1QL queries.

body.p: Similarly to the nodes running the data service, there is a set of questions you need to answer to take care of your application needs:

ol.li: Which fields need to be indexed?
Is that a simple index or compound indexes?
What is the minimum, average, or maximum value of the indexed field?
How many indexes do you need?
What is the bucket size? (for example, how many documents are in the bucket)

body.p: Based on the obtained answers you will be able to size your cluster better for your indexing needs.
